title: LF Midlaner Team FuroX plat-dia+ individual trials

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team FuroX (@TeamFurox). Oceanic eSports organization dedicated to player development and the gaming community. Partners:- @JayF_Designs. Australia

body:
Midlaners needed we require you
Have a mic, have former team experience, be available on weekdays 5pm aedt plus have sundays free for tournments, have teamspeak
The trials will work out with a schedule we r playing with as our team is following right now, we will invite u to games and deepending on performance throught out the couple of days a choice will be made if u fit in or not first come first serve rule will be implied.
The last requirement take it serious u have a chance to play under sponsor with this opportunity  and be on time when i give u a time 

IGN FuroXWarBoss
